title: 'Extremely strange': High-speed train smashes into oncoming one in Spain; witnesses recount horror
content: Tragedy struck southern Spain as a high-speed train derailed, colliding with another service and claiming at least 21 lives.  The incident, described as 'extremely strange' by the transport minister, occurred on a straight track.  Rescue efforts are ongoing for those trapped, with rail traffic suspended.  The cause remains under investigation.

title: MNS defiant: Raj Thackeray asks corporators to turn civic houses into ‚Äòbattlegrounds‚Äô
content: MNS chief Raj Thackeray has called on his newly elected corporators to be combative. He acknowledged the party's election results were not as expected. Thackeray stated that corporators must challenge what he called the 'rule of money power'. They are also tasked with opposing policies that harm Marathi interests. The MNS aims to be a strong voice in civic governance.

title: Delhi chokes again: AQI 'severe' at 418; flights ops hit due to dense fog
content: Delhi-NCR choked under a severe smog and fog blanket Monday, with air quality hitting 'severe-plus' in several areas. Flights faced delays as the Air Quality Index (AQI) soared, with PM2.5 levels reaching alarming peaks. Experts cite local emissions and stagnant air for the dangerous spike, posing significant health risks.

title: ‚ÄòBlue drum‚Äô murder rerun: Retired railway staffer kills lover, burns body; accused had two wives
content: In a chilling turn of events, a former railway worker is accused of murdering his girlfriend, Preeti, amid financial disagreements. The grim discovery unfolded when the loader driver, tasked with getting rid of a blue trunk, noticed something amiss and contacted the authorities. Inside, they found charred remains, leading to an investigation that may involve the suspect's son as well.

title: 'Dragged down sidewalk': US influencer 'robbed' by Somali thugs; incident caught on cam
content: American influencer Nick Sortor reported being robbed by a group of Somali men in Minneapolis, claiming his camera was stolen and he was dragged. The FBI has confirmed involvement, stating an investigation is under way. Sortor expressed defiance against the alleged perpetrators. This incident followed a pro-ICE rally led by January 6th participant Jake Lang.

title: Google vs court ruling: Tech giant refuses to share data with OpenAI
content: Google has asked a judge to delay sharing its data with rivals like OpenAI, challenging a ruling that found the company holds an illegal monopoly in online search. The tech giant argues the order risks exposing trade secrets before its appeal is decided, asserting users choose Google willingly. Google is not seeking to postpone other requirements from the previous orders.

title: IND vs NZ: Kohli keeps taking giant strides ‚Äì all the big records India‚Äôs run-machine set
content: Virat Kohli's magnificent 124 in the series decider against New Zealand, though in a losing effort, cemented his legendary status. This 54th ODI century, his seventh against the Kiwis, saw him rewrite multiple records, including most international hundreds against them and highest runs at No.3 in ODIs. Despite India's loss, Kohli's consistent brilliance shone through.

title: Operation Trashi-I: Gunfight breaks out in J&K‚Äôs Kishtwar; 8 Army personnel injured
content: A fierce gun battle in Kishtwar's remote forests left eight Army personnel injured on Sunday. Security forces engaged two to three suspected foreign terrorists during a search operation. Reinforcements have been deployed, and a massive hunt is underway to neutralize the militants. This marks the third encounter in the Jammu region this year, with intensified operations ahead of Republic Day.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for the week starting January 19 - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Motilal Oswal Financial Services Ltd recommends buying 60 One, and Canara HSBC Life as top stock picks for this week. Let‚Äôs take a look:

title: 'I chose it out of passion': Google founder Sergey Brin on studying computer science
content: Google co-founder Sergey Brin recently shared insights on the evolving value of higher education in the age of AI. He emphasized that passion and curiosity, rather than just credentials, drive success, even as AI capabilities grow. Brin also noted Google's shift towards hiring "self-taught stars" with proven skills over solely relying on traditional degrees.

title: IND vs NZ: Kohli‚Äôs century stands out in defeat; Gill calls for introspection
content: Despite a 41-run series-deciding loss to New Zealand, Indian captain Shubman Gill acknowledged Virat Kohli's stellar 54th ODI century as a significant positive. Gill admitted the team needs improvement in several areas, highlighting the valuable contributions of Harshit Rana and Nitish Kumar Reddy as the focus shifts towards future combinations and the World Cup.

title: Budget 2026 for taxpayers: Five fixes that can make taxes less taxing - explained
content: Budget 2026 doesn‚Äôt need fireworks. It needs fine-tuning. Fewer forms, fairer taxes, clearer rules, and smarter incentives could go a long way in making taxation less intimidating‚Äîand more humane.

title: 'Dhurandhar' ends seventh weekend with Rs 8.5 crore haul
content: Aditya Dhar's 'Dhurandhar', starring Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna, concluded its seventh weekend with a strong Rs 8.5 crore, reversing an earlier slowdown. The film has achieved one of the highest seventh-week performances ever, now standing second on the all-time list. With a staggering Rs 825.1 crore net collection, 'Dhurandhar' is on track to join the Rs 1,000 crore club.

title: Jeff Bezos‚Äô ex-wife's donations questioned - What it revealed?
content: MacKenzie Scott's ex-wife, Jeff Bezos, has donated millions to the Solidaire Network, which funds groups facing FBI and congressional investigations for alleged Hamas ties. While Scott's donations are unrestricted, the network supports organizations like Students for Justice in Palestine. Scott has given billions to various causes, impacting diversity programs and higher education.

title: Spain: Over 20 killed after high-speed trains collide; videos show passengers crawling out of windows
content: A devastating train crash in southern Spain has claimed at least 21 lives. A high-speed train derailed and collided with an oncoming service near Cordoba. Hundreds of passengers were involved in the incident. Rescue operations are underway. The cause of the accident remains under investigation. Train services between Madrid and Andalusia are suspended.

title: 20-year-old Manipur gang rape survivor dies waiting for justice
content: A young Kuki-Zo woman, just 20 years old, has tragically lost her battle for life after enduring years of torment as a consequence of the ethnic violence that erupted in Manipur. She was kidnapped and assaulted in May 2023‚Äîa harrowing incident that has remained stalled in the legal system despite an FIR filed over two years ago.

title: 'We could see only a thin ray of light': Noida techie‚Äôs final struggle in abandoned pit
content: A 27-year-old software engineer tragically lost his life after his SUV plunged into a deep, unbarricaded pit on a foggy night in Noida. Despite a desperate struggle for survival and attempts by rescuers, the dense fog and the pit's depth hampered efforts. The incident highlights severe safety lapses at the construction site, leading to legal action against the builders.

title: Bill Belichick ESPN Role; UNC Post 4-8" (39 chars). Cuts fluff, retains facts
content: Bill Belichick will appear on ESPN‚Äôs ACC Network broadcast of the College Football Playoff national championship game in South Florida. The TV role comes weeks after his first season as North Carolina‚Äôs head coach ended at 4‚Äì8. Belichick is also focused on recruiting, including adding quarterback Billy Edwards Jr. ahead of the Tar Heels‚Äô April 12 spring game.

title: Tom Brady grows wary of past mistakes with Alix Earle amid romance rumors
content: Tom Brady and popular influencer, Alix Earle, turned heads with their romance at the New Year‚Äôs Eve party in St. Barth‚Äôs. The two were spotted standing close to each other as Alix Earle rubbed Tom Brady‚Äôs back. This has sparked chaos among fans as many are excited about their future. But it seems the NFL legend might be ‚Äúsuspicious‚Äù of Alix Earle.

title: Roger Federer revisits Australian Open glory with wife Mirka and kids
content: Roger Federer returned to the 2026 Australian Open with his full family and shared emotional memories from Melbourne. The seven-time champion spoke about reliving past wins, watching old clips, and his children playing with his trophy. Federer also played an exhibition match, giving fans another special moment from the tennis legend.

title: BMC power play: Eknath Shinde signals hard bargain, BJP short of numbers; mayor‚Äôs post in focus
content: In a bold statement, Maharashtra's Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde declared that the prestigious mayoral seat in the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) will be secured by the Mahayuti alliance, even though his party holds fewer seats than the Shiv Sena (UBT).

title: Francis Ngannou floors iShowSpeed in playful moment before AFCON final
content: ‚Äã‚ÄãFrancis Ngannou dropped iShowSpeed to the ground in a playful moment before the Africa Cup of Nations final in Morocco. The scene, caught on camera, quickly went viral. Their exchange sparked talk of influencer boxing, though no fight is confirmed. Fans around the world reacted as the clip spread fast online.

title: When winter burns: Uttarakhand to Kashmir, Himalayan forests are catching fire out of season
content: Himalayan forests are experiencing an unprecedented winter fire season, breaking decades of predictable patterns. Uttarakhand has recorded the highest number of fire alerts nationwide since November 1, with December emerging as a particularly active month. Scientists attribute this alarming trend to climate variability intensifying natural fire cycles, indicating a significant ecological shift.

title: Bengaluru dashcam horror: Man pulls out knife, threatens family in car after spat; held
content: A 25-year-old man was arrested in Bengaluru for threatening a family with a knife after a road rage incident. The alleged offence, captured on a dashcam near Nexus Shantiniketan Mall, showed the accused verbally abusing and then brandishing a knife at the car occupants. The accused, identified as Sayed Arbaz Khan, has a history of previous arrests.

title: 'Bhabhi bol': Rana recalls how Kohli pulled his leg after meeting Anushka - Watch
content: Harshit Rana recounted a funny moment with Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma.  This happened after India won the 2025 Champions Trophy.  Rana met Anushka Sharma for the first time and called her 'ma'am'. Kohli playfully corrected him, asking him to call her 'Bhabhi'.  The story highlights Kohli's humorous side and ability to keep the team atmosphere light.

title: BMC mayor race heats up: Fadnavis in Davos, talks put on hold; poll process may drag till Jan-end
content: Mumbai's mayoral election date is set for January 29 or 30, following a lottery on January 22 to determine the category. Discussions on power-sharing within the BMC are expected to continue throughout the month. Meanwhile, Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis is in Davos for the World Economic Forum, focusing on attracting investments and boosting Maharashtra's economy.

title: IndiGo to inform if it can fly 2k flights daily
content: IndiGo faces a critical deadline this week to confirm its ability to operate over 2,000 daily flights under new, stricter pilot duty rules. Failure to comply could lead to flight cuts, averting a repeat of last December's disruptions. The airline is conducting dry runs to assess its readiness as authorities closely monitor the situation.

title: Indore‚Äôs richest beggar? Man picked up from street turns out to be crorepati
content: A mission to free Indore of beggars unexpectedly revealed a physically disabled man, Mangilal, who amassed crores.  Known for his discreet methods in Sarafa Bazaar, he collected substantial daily earnings. Upon being approached for rehabilitation, Mangilal disclosed ownership of multiple properties, three rented auto-rickshaws, and a car with a driver, exposing a hidden wealth far beyond his street persona.

title: ‚ÄòNo boundary wall‚Äô: FIR against 2 after techie drowns in Noida pit; junior engineer sacked
content: Tragedy struck in Noida's Sector 150 as a software engineer drowned after his car plunged into an unsecured water pit. An FIR has been filed against the builders of MZ Wishtown Planners and Lotus Greens Construction for negligence. The lack of proper fencing and visibility turned the plot into a fatal trap, leading to the young engineer's untimely death.

title: MP govt plans Hiroshima‚ÄìNagasaki-style memorial; cost pegged at over Rs 1,200 crore
content: Madhya Pradesh is set to create a memorial at the site of the Union Carbide disaster, drawing parallels with the memorials in Hiroshima and Nagasaki. This ambitious project is part of a broader initiative that includes the incineration of hazardous waste and plans for a comprehensive scientific study to evaluate existing contamination.

title: BBL: Babar Azam flops again as nightmare deepens; proving Smith's call spot on
content: Babar Azam's Big Bash League struggles persisted with another low score for Sydney Sixers against Brisbane Heat. Despite the team's crucial win, Babar's form and strike rate remain a concern, highlighted by a recent incident with Steve Smith. The Sixers secured a playoff spot, but questions linger over the Pakistani star's tempo.

title: When is Super Bowl 60? Date, kickoff time, odds and key details
content: Super Bowl 2026 is quickly taking shape as the NFL playoffs narrow the field to true contenders. New England‚Äôs win sets up a blockbuster AFC title game, while the NFC race remains fierce. With odds tightening, Levi‚Äôs Stadium confirmed, Bad Bunny headlining halftime, and tickets in demand, anticipation for February 8 continues to surge.

title: How India got its first woman PM this day in 1966
content: Indira Gandhi made history on January 19, 1966, becoming India's first woman Prime Minister after a closely contested election within the Congress Parliamentary Party. Defeating Morarji Desai in a four-hour drama, her victory marked a significant shift in party leadership battles and ushered in a new era for Indian politics. The nation celebrated this momentous personal and political triumph.

title: Fact check: Was Mike Tomlin linked to a Pennsylvania nurse amid Steelers step-aside
content: Mike Tomlin, the Pittsburgh Steelers‚Äô former coach, sparked chaos when he stepped down from his role after 19 seasons. Many fans have remain confused about the exact reason behind Mike Tomlin‚Äôs move. Amid all the mess, there has been a new discussion about Mike Tomlin allegedly cheating on his wife, Kiya Tomlin, with a nurse from Pennsylvania.

title: Vande Bharat Sleeper ticket cancellation to be costly affair
content: Indian Railways has introduced stricter cancellation charges for its new Vande Bharat Sleeper trains. Passengers face a 25% deduction for cancellations made anytime after booking, escalating to 50% if cancelled between 72 and eight hours before departure. No refunds are offered for cancellations within eight hours of departure, a change from previous norms.

title: Highway builders write to FM, road ministry; seek review of new arbitration norms
content: Highway builders are opposing a government order ending arbitration for disputes exceeding Rs 10 crore. The National Highway Builders Federation has urged the finance minister for sector-specific guidance. They argue this change will negatively impact ongoing projects, lenders, and the banking system. The federation believes this framework discourages investment and delays project execution.

title: ‚ÄòJungle raj‚Äô must end for growth: PM Modi in West Bengal; attacks TMC govt
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi launched a sharp attack on the Trinamool Congress government in West Bengal, calling for an end to "maha jungle raj" to restore law and order and attract investment. He accused the TMC of facilitating infiltration and blocking central welfare schemes, framing the upcoming assembly elections as a choice between "jungle raj" and BJP's "sushasan" (good governance).

title: CIC: Lawyers can't use RTI for cases they are handling
content: The Central Information Commission (CIC) ruled that advocates cannot use the RTI Act to obtain case details for clients, citing a Madras High Court judgment. The CIC emphasized that such usage defeats the RTI Act's core objectives and could be exploited to promote legal practice, not for genuine citizen information access.

title: EU to fire trade 'bazooka'? Macron urges tough action against Trump tariffs
content: France will ask the EU to activate its anti-coercion instrument against potential US tariffs over Greenland. President Macron stated the threat is unacceptable and Europe will not be intimidated. The tool, a trade 'bazooka,' allows the bloc to curb imports or market access in response to economic coercion.

title: J&K: Encounter breaks out in Kishtwar, 3 injured soldiers airlifted
content: A fierce gunbattle erupted in Kishtwar's remote forested region, leaving seven security personnel injured as they engaged terrorists.  The operation, dubbed "Operation Trashi-I," commenced after a tip-off about two to three militants. Reinforcements, including drones and helicopters, have been deployed to neutralize the threat. This marks the third encounter in the Jammu region this year.

title: Tom Brady prioritizes family amid Alix Earle dating rumors
content: Tom Brady, the NFL legend, has now sparked rumors of romance with popular influencer and Braxton Berrios' ex girlfriend, Alix Earle, after the two were spotted together at a party, two weeks ago. While fans are excited about the couple's future together, Tom Brady has now finally spoken out about his life currently and has made his priorities pretty clear.

title: Occult ‚Äòhuman sacrifice‚Äô: 3 kill friend, burn body for ‚Äòdivine blessings‚Äô in Ghaziabad
content: Ghaziabad police arrested two men for allegedly murdering a friend as part of an occult ritual. The victim, Naveen, was killed and his body set ablaze inside an auto. The accused confessed to meeting a tantrik who suggested human sacrifice for wealth. They attacked Naveen with a gas cylinder. Evidence including the auto and cylinder were recovered.

title: Los Angeles prevail in divisional-round win over Chicago
content: The Bears had been kings of comeback wins, but the Rams are the ones advancing to the NFC title game.

title: Rams survive Bears' clutch play with FG in OT
content: Despite another improbable late touchdown from the Bears to force overtime, the Rams held on, picking off QB Caleb Williams to set up the game-winning FG.

title: Stroud on career-worst 4 INTs: 'Let people down'
content: Houston QB C.J. Stroud shouldered the blame after one of the worst outings of his career saw the Texans' season end in a loss to the Patriots.

title: Patriots happy to flaunt D vs. vaunted Texans unit
content: Thanks to a swarming defensive performance -- which tied the franchise postseason record with four interceptions -- the Patriots advance to the AFC Championship Game next Sunday against the Broncos.

title: Big Ten, SEC still deadlocked on CFP expansion
content: College Football Playoff leaders held an annual business meeting Sunday but did not reach a resolution on a future format as a deadline looms Friday.

title: Gotterup wins Sony Open, cracks top 20 in world
content: Chris Gotterup opened the new PGA Tour season with three big birdies on the back nine that carried him to a 6-under 64 and a two-shot victory in the Sony Open.

title: Gauff cruises to Round 2 despite serve struggles
content: Third-seeded Coco Gauff had some familiar struggles on serve but had still enough class and power to defeat Kamilla Rakhimova 6-2, 6-3 on Monday in a first-round match at the Australian Open.

title: Morant knocks down trade talk: 'Very loyal guy'
content: Ja Morant, who returned for the Grizzlies on Sunday from a calf injury, says there should be no doubt about his desire to keep playing for Memphis.

content: The NFL offseason has arrived for 26 teams. What must each do to have a better season in 2026? We have outlooks, early buzz and predictions.

content: The Broncos advanced to the AFC title game but lost their QB to a broken ankle. So what's next for them on their Super Bowl quest?

content: Manchester City's title bid is as good as over after Manchester United won the midfield battle at Old Trafford.

content: Curt Cignetti has lots to be happy about, but you wouldn't know it by looking at him. His players and assistants break down their favorite Cignetti memes and faces.

title: Meet 'the special 13': The JMU transfers forming an unlikely Indiana CFP title core
content: Thirteen Dukes players followed Curt Cignetti to become Hoosiers. Those who remain are on the verge of CFB history.

title: Will Fernando Mendoza be the next Heisman-winning QB to fall victim to the national championship curse?
content: Since 1988, seven quarterbacks who have won the Heisman Trophy and earned a title game berth have fallen in the national championship game. Is Mendoza next?

title: Men's: Duke is a 1-seed again
content: Is the ACC back? Eight single-digit seeds -- including one on the top line -- and a couple of bubble teams would suggest so.

title: Women's: South Carolina ascends to No. 2 overall
content: Texas, which fell at South Carolina on Thursday, tumbles to the final No. 1 seed after its second straight loss.

content: Kevin Stefanski didn't have a great record in Cleveland, but he'll have more talent to work with in Atlanta.

content: The 63-year-old has been able to call his own shot in this coaching search and wound up choosing the Giants.

content: 'It was dead silent' when the coach stunned the Steelers' locker room. Here's what we know about what's next.

content: What is the Palermo Protocol? How does the Bhartiya Nyaya Sanhita, 2023 define trafficking? How does the Constitution of India protect children from exploitation? How has the Supreme Court reacted? Why is a strong Centre-State relationship important for countering exploitation?

title: When rescue workers fumbled, delivery agent entered water-filled pit to help Greater Noida techie
content: Police rejected allegations of negligence saying fire department teams made efforts to save the youth and deployed a crane, ladder, makeshift boat and searchlights, but visibility was near zero due to fog

title: Plea to upgrade Neredmet railway station
content: Suburban Train Travellers Association also appealed to the railway authorities to provide stoppages for all express trains at Malkajgiri railway station, given its importance and the heavy passenger traffic it handles

title: Shipbuilding yard to come up at Ponnani port under PPP model
content: The shipyard will be established on about 29 acres of coastal land on the western side of the Ponnani fishing harbour, making it the second shipyard in the State after Kochi.

title: Temperatures drop as dry weather prevails over T.N.
content: Minimum temperatures were below normal by one degree Celsius to three degrees Celsius at most places over Tamil Nadu, Puducherry, and Karaikal area

title: AICC appoints presidents for district units in T.N.
content: AICC observers assigned to each district conducted detailed reviews, engaged with party functionaries and other stakeholders, and submitted comprehensive reports

title: Mumbai will get Mahayuti Mayor: Eknath Shinde; 'People chose development over emotional issues'
content: Taking a dig at Uddhav Thackeray-led Shiv Sena (UBT), Mr. Shinde said voters had chosen development over emotional issues

content: Navarro‚Äôs comments came as ties between New Delhi and Washington are reeling under strain on several other issues apart from tariffs

title: From back office to cutting edge, India emerges as hub for GCCs
content: The availability of a large, cheaper English-speaking IT workforce led foreign firms to begin setting up subsidiaries in the country 40 years ago. Today, multinational companies have deepened their presence in this multi-billion dollar oasis in the job market, with at least one Global Capability Centre being established every week. From playing a supporting role, GCCs are now shaping the business

title: 9 killed, 80 injured after bus carrying marriage party overturns in Jharkhand's Latehar
content: In a post on X, Chief Minister Hemant Soren asked the Latehar Deputy Commissioner to provide appropriate medical facilities to the injured

title: UAE President to visit India as Trump peace plan for Gaza takes shape
content: The visit acquires added significance as it will start two days after the UAE welcomed President Trump‚Äôs announcement on the formation of the ‚ÄòBoard of Peace‚Äô for which India has also received an invite

content: The Madras high court had cautioned that otherwise, "every practising advocate would invoke the provisions of the RTI Act for getting information on behalf of his client", which "does not advance the objects of the scheme of the RTI Act

title: Clamour for two parallel bridges to Goshree Islands gets louder
content: The demand has intensified amid fears of worsening traffic as the Munambam‚ÄìAzhikode bridge linking Thrissur and Ernakulam is set to open later this year. Stakeholders also cite the widening of the coastal highway

title: Bringing back Akali Dal to power would drag Punjab into dark era: CM Mann
content: Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) leader Talbir Singh Gill will be the AAP‚Äôs candidate from Majitha in the 2027 Assembly elections, Mr. Mann declared

title: Kerala SIR: Deadline for filing claims and objections extended up to January 30
content: Earlier, the period was fixed from December 23, when the draft electoral was published, to January 22.

title: Kerala Kalolsavam 2026 | Kannur crowned champions at State School Arts Festival
content: Kannur won the Gold Cup, scoring 1,028 points, with defending champion Thrissur  securing runner-up position with 1,023 points. Kozhikode finishes third with  1,017 points. BSS Gurkulam, Alathur, retains the title for best school with 238 points

title: India invited to sit on Trump‚Äôs Board of Peace for Gaza
content: New Delhi has not yet responded to the invitation, sources say; the Board of Peace is a key part of the U.S. President‚Äôs peace plan for Gaza, intended to supervise a transitional governance committee of experts

title: Winds ground balloons, then give way: dramatic finale as Hyderabad Hot Air Balloon festival ends on a high
content: Brief pause in operations on final day of festival¬†at Parade Ground, Secunderabad, causes anxious moments for hundreds of ticket holders but all of them were eventually accommodated as weather conditions improved

title: Anna University partners with¬† the Andhra Pradesh government to develop drone ambulance
content: The project will ensure rapid medical response in remote and underserved regions and strengthen public health infrastructure. This is one of the key projects envisioned by Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu to modernise emergency healthcare and human transport systems

title: SNDP, NSS newfound friendship leaves opposing alliances in Kerala scrambling to recalibrate
content: In crucial poll year, Hindu social organisations representing Nair, Ezhava interests bury the hatchet on their long-standing differences on reservations

title: Traffic snarls cause inconvenience on many roads due to Sankranti rush
content: Vehicular movement slow on the national highways leading to Chennai, Hyderabad, Bengaluru and other cities

title: Kerala Kalolsavam 2026 | Aranmula style wins the Vanchipattu race
content: Most of the teams prefer the style, which is steeped in devotion, to the Kuttanad style that is more energetic

title: Media bodies seek new chairperson for Press Council of India
content: ‚ÄòThe term of the 14th Council ended more than a year ago, but the full 15th Council is yet to be formed, and the post of chairman has not been filled,‚Äô several media associations say in a joint statement

title: Tamil Nadu government institutes literary award for works in seven Indian languages
content: In the first phase, the best literary works in Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam, Odia, Bengali, and Marathi will receive the¬†Semmozhi¬†Literary Award every year. The award will carry a cash prize of ‚Çπ5¬†lakh¬†for each language, Chief Minister M.K. Stalin  says at the valediction of Chennai International Book Fair 2026

title: KTR, Harish Rao flay CM‚Äôs call for demolition of BRS flag posts
content: They say its unconstitutional for a CM to give such call, they want DGP to take action against efforts to disturb L&O; warn of retaliation

title: Kochi City police register 111 NDPS cases in three weeks
content: 31 NDPS cases registered on January 17 alone during a day-long special combing operation across the city. Police say all cases detected during the drive relate to alleged substance use

title: BDA@50: How the BDA site dream turned sour
content: As rates soared, the authority was unable to acquire the land¬†at market prices and still make layouts viable and keep the sites affordable

title: Revised guidelines issued for palliative care in Kerala local bodies
content: Revised palliative care guidelines enhance local services, ensuring comprehensive support for all income groups in Kerala‚Äôs communities.

title: SNDP Yogam, NSS take tentative steps to cooperation
content: The thaw in relations, which has been gradually taking shape since the Global Ayyappa Sangamam in September last year, spills into the public domain, driven by their shared opposition to Leader of the Opposition V.D. Satheesan

title: NDRF 10th Battalion to celebrate Raising Day on January 19
content: The force saved 67 persons in major operations and evacuated 1,634 people in 2025, winning laurels from one and all, says Commandant Prasanna Kumar

title: Lakshmi Parvathi accuses Naidu of using NTR legacy for diversionary politics
content: YSR Congress Party leader alleges that the Chief Minister invokes NTR‚Äôs name to deflect criticism, cites the unfulfilled 2014 statue promise and demands a Bharat Ratna and policy reversals to prove sincerity

title: Automated toll issues trigger jams on partially opened Bengaluru‚ÄìChennai Expressway
content: The expressway, envisioned to cut travel time between Bengaluru and Chennai to under three hours, is still under construction. Of the total 262-km length, around 71 km has been completed so far.

title: There‚Äôs an organised campaign to accuse CPI(M) of indulging in soft Hindutva: Baby
content: CPI(M) general secretary says Pinarayi Vijayan will lead LDF‚Äôs poll campaign, but says Polit Bureau is yet to take a call on relaxing term limits

title: ‚ÄòNo proof of adverse reaction due to JE vaccination in Malappuram, Kozhikode‚Äô
content: This comes against the backdrop of reports that a few children from Malappuram and Kozhikode were hospitalised after exhibiting adverse reactions following the vaccination

title: Bus operators warn of indefinite strike on Kannur-Thalassery route from January 28
content: Though National Highway development is progressing rapidly, the construction of a newly built underpass near the Nadal railway gate has emerged as a major bottleneck

title: Construction of TIMS Sanathnagar in final stages; inauguration likely by Ugadi in March
content: The hospital is being equipped with a modern organ transplantation centre and advanced operation theatres capable of supporting all types of transplant surgeries

title: Vehicles returning after Pongal holidays clog GST Road
content: Traffic jams were seen on several locations, including Singaperumal Koil, Madurantakam, and Tambaram. Chengalpattu town‚Äôs interior roads were busier than usual due to motorists taking detours to reach OMR and ECR

title: Many tribal children in Sirkazhi village denied anganwadi services, face malnutrition
content: Children no longer receive eggs, sathumavu (fortified nutrition mix), and cooked meals; their parents, mostly daily wage earners, are struggling to provide them nutritious food

title: Despite denial of dues by the Centre, CM Stalin allocates funds for all schemes, says Finance Minister Thangam Thennarasu
content: We pay [a huge amount of funds] in the Goods and Services Tax to the Centre. But the Centre is not devolving proportionate funds to Tamil Nadu, he says after performing the¬†Bhoomi¬†puja for a road over bridge at¬†Tiruthangal¬†

title: BJP to host national Ekatma Manav Darshan convention in Vijayawada from January 23
content: Two-day event at Indira Gandhi Municipal Stadium to revisit Deendayal Upadhyaya‚Äôs philosophy and commemorate the historic 1965 resolution

title: Greenland grab: Nato secy general calls Trump, to meet US Prez; details of arctic call under wraps
content:
Nato secretary general Mark Rutte (L), US President Donald Trump (R) (Photo: Oct 22, 2025)

Nato security general Mark Rutte spoke with US President Donald Trump over Greenland and the Arctic security concerns of the United States. Posting on X about his interaction, he said they will continue to work on the matter and that he will be meeting Trump in Davos later this week. In his post, he said, "Spoke with POTUS regarding the security situation in Greenland and the Arctic. We will continue working on this, and I look forward to seeing him in Davos later this week.

title: Driven by state-run utilities, distribution companies post Rs 2,700cr profit
content: Atul Mathur is a Senior Assistant Editor at The Times of India with over 27 years of experience in journalism. Based in Delhi, he has spent much of his career reporting on governance, public policy and politics, churning out researched, data-driven stories that impact daily lives. Atul is known for investigative depth and strong human-interest narratives as he strives to bring clarity and context to complex issues. He currently tracks the energy sector, writing on power, renewable energy, coal and mines. Read More

title: Grant bail in case of delayed trial: Ex-CJI cites Umar Khalid case
content: former chief justice of india DY Chandrachud says prison terms undermine constitutional justice . he cites cases such as Umar Khalid's and warning courts to rigorously test national security claims . Khalid has been in custody since 2020 under UAPA in connection with an alleged conspiracy .

title: Old Generation Should Retire, New Must Take Charge: Nitin Gadkari
content: Union minister Nitin Gadkari on Sunday pitched for the next generation taking important responsibilities and the old generation stepping aside when things start running smoothly.

title: Disguises, Boats, Flights: Video Shows Machado's Daring Escape From Venezuela
content: The mission, dubbed Operation Golden Dynamite, was marked by difficult weather conditions and extended periods of uncertainty.

title: CEO Of Iran's 2nd Largest Telecom Firm Fired For Failing To Block Internet
content: In an unprecedented move, Iran cut off all communications on January 8 without warning, as calls intensified for anti-government protests, initially sparked by the economic crisis.

title: Top 12 Billionaires Have More Wealth Than Poorest Half: Oxfam Report
content: US President Donald Trump's policies in particular spurred the fortunes of the ultra-rich, which jumped 16.2 percent in the first year of his second term to $18.3 trillion, Oxfam said in a report released each year ahead of the Davos forum.

title: "Europeans Project Weakness": Team Trump Justifies Need To Control Greenland
content: European "weakness" necessitates US control of Greenland for global stability, US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said, even as some lawmakers sounded alarms about the Trump administration's effort to acquire the Arctic territory held by Denmark.

title: 'Applying Tariffs On NATO Allies Over Greenland Is Wrong': UK PM To Trump
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer spoke to US President Donald Trump on Sunday after talking to the leaders of Denmark, the EU and NATO, to say he believed "applying tariffs on allies for pursuing the collective security of NATO allies is wrong".

title: 'Helps Economically Disadvantaged': Oxfam Praises India's Quota In Politics
content: As it flagged billionaires usurping the political landscape globally, rights group Oxfam on Monday cited India's reservation system as a "compelling" example of progress on how ordinary people can be politically empowered.

title: Explained: What Is Gaza's 'Board Of Peace', Dubbed Trump's 'United Nations'
content: US President Donald Trump has invited India to join his so-called "Board of Peace" initiative, which is aimed at resolving global conflicts, beginning with Gaza.

title: $1 Billion Can Get Nations A Permanent Seat On Trump's Gaza Peace Board
content: At least eight more countries say the United States has invited them to join President Donald Trump's Board of Peace, a new body of world leaders meant to oversee next steps in Gaza that shows ambitions for a broader mandate in global affairs.

title: Countries Invited By Trump To Be Part Of Gaza 'Board Of Peace'
content: US President Donald Trump's administration has reached out to various figures around the world to sit on a so-called "Board of Peace" and related entities meant to oversee governance and reconstruction in postwar Gaza.

title: Billionaires 4,000 Times More Likely To Hold Political Office: Oxfam
content: As the rich and powerful from across the world start filling snow-clad lanes here, a new study said billionaires are 4,000 times more likely to hold any political office than ordinary people.

title: 'Bail Should Be Rule If...': Ex-Chief Justice DY Chandrachud On Umar Khalid's Plea
content: Former Chief Justice of India DY Chandrachud was responding to a question on the Supreme Court denying bail to activist Umar Khalid in the 2020 Delhi riots case.

title: 2 High-Speed Trains Collide In "Extremely Strange" Crash In Spain, 21 Dead
content: Spain on Monday reeled from a collision between two high-speed trains in the southern region of Andalusia that killed 21 people and injured more than 70, with the prime minister lamenting a "night of deep pain".

title: School Timings Changed For All Classes In Noida Due To Cold, Dense Fog
content: In view of dense fog and severe cold conditions prevailing across Gautam Buddh Nagar district in Uttar Pradesh, the district administration has revised school timings for all classes, officials said on Sunday.

title: Married UP Man Kills Live-In Partner, Puts Body In Box, Burns It
content: A retired railway employee allegedly killed his 35-year-old live-in partner, stuffed her body into a metal trunk and set it on fire in Uttar Pradesh's Jhansi earlier this month.

title: Trump Invites India To Be Part Of Gaza's "Board Of Peace"
content: US President Donald Trump has invited India to be a part of what he called "Board of Peace" meant to oversee governance and reconstruction in postwar Gaza, sources told NDTV.

title: NATO's "Future" At Stake: Danish Foreign Minister On Trump's Tariff Threat
content: The NATO alliance is at risk from US President Donald Trump's tariff threat on NATO allies backing Denmark against his goal to seize control of Greenland, Danish Foreign Minister Lars Lokke Rasmussen said Sunday.

title: Uganda President Yoweri, 81, Says Opposition "Terrorists" In Victory Speech
content: Uganda's President Yoweri Museveni, fresh from winning a seventh term at age 81, said Sunday that the opposition were "terrorists" who had tried to use violence to overturn results.

title: Can Miami become the latest team to lift the national title on 'home' field?

title: Carson Beck the runner? The Miami QB is finally using his feet
content: Carson Beck hasn't run a 40-yard dash in years, but it hardly qualifies him as slow . he showcased his wheels on a 3-yard scramble into the end zone to secure a trip to the college football playoff national championship . safety Jakobe Thomas appeared to be the originator, dubbing Beck as the Miami's version of Michael Vick .

title: MLB offseason grades: Mets pivot to Bichette after Dodgers sign top free agent Tucker
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . the deal: three years, $126 million with opt-outs after first two seasons Grade: B- The new york Mets have a new heart .

title: Nick Foles' message to Broncos fans: Pats 'struggle against backup QBs'
content: the Broncos will face the new England Patriots in next Sunday's AFC Championship game . backup quarterback Jarrett Stidham is out for the rest of the playoffs . he hasn't started a game since the final two of the 2023 season .

title: Seahawks start fast and roll past 49ers, advance to NFC Championship Game
content: the Seahawks return the opening kickoff for a touchdown and never look back in a rout of the 49ers in the divisional round . coach Mike Macdonald's team now has an even stronger claim as the most complete team in this season's playoffs . the team's top-rated special teams got it started with Rashid Shaheed returning the kickoff 95 yards .

title: NHL trade grades: Why the Rasmus Andersson swap could be a big win for both teams
content: the Calgary Flames traded defenseman Rasmus Andersson to the Vegas Golden Knights for a package that included defenseman Zach Whitecloud . Previously, the Vancouver Canucks traded Quinn Hughes to the Minnesota Wild in exchange for Zeev Buium , Marco Rossi , Liam Ohgren and a 2026 first-round pick .

title: VAR review: Should Man United's Dalot have received a red card for foul on Doku?
content: Mikel Arteta questions the decision not to award a late penalty in their goalless draw with Nottingham Forest . the video assistant referee causes controversy every week in the premier league . we take a look at the major incidents to examine and explain the process .

title: Patriots hold off Texans in turnover-filled divisional round playoff game
content: the new England Patriots beat texans 28-16 in a divisional round playoff game . the Patriots' defense forced five turnovers, intercepting Texans quarterback C.J. Stroud four times . new England quarterback Drake Maye overcame three turnovers to help the no. 2 seed advance .

title: Ex-Colorado QB Staub transferring to Tennessee
content: Staub is the only likely transfer addition for the Vols in 2026 . he started two games in three years at Colorado and will have two years of eligibility remaining . Staub's commitment comes after a flurry of visits to Cincinnati, Kentucky, Ohio State, Liberty and Tennessee .

title: 10 NBA teams that could swing trade season's final 20 days
content: the league's three-week sprint to the Feb. 5 trade deadline is here . many contenders are still deciding on a direction . a weekly trip around the Association focuses on those teams trying to add to their rosters .
